workgroup_id.name: workgroup_id
workgroup_id.description: The workgroup ID that the user is currently participating in.
workgroup_id.validation_error_text: Parameter workgroup_id only accepts integer numbers.

show_trunk.name: show_trunk
show_trunk.description: Show down interfaces on the node.
show_trunk.validation_error_text: Parameter show_trunk only accepts either 0 or 1 for false or true values, respectively.

show_down.name: show_down
show_down.description: Show down interfaces on the node.
show_down.validation_error_text: Parameter show_down only accepts either 0 or 1 for false or true values, respectively.

type.name: type
type.validation_error_text: CGI input parameter type does not match pattern /^(openflow|mpls|all)$/

node.name: node
node.description: Name of the node to get a list of available interfaces for.
node.validation_error_text: Parameter node only accepts printable characters and spaces, including newlines. This excludes control characters.

name: get_node_interfaces
description: returns a list of interfaces on the given node
